name: Tavern Gourmet
description:
Find yourself in the city of Karminage where all the species live together in peace and harmony.

You meet a cute girl on the street of this city and she hires you as a barman in her newly opened tavern. Help her manage the tavern and listen to the exciting stories of the inhabitants of this city!

Download the game for the best experience (web version is a little laggy and doesn't work properly)

Before you play the game

i am concerned about your ears, so please, before you start playing, lower the sound and music volume

                                                                                                                                                                                             

  • 5 endings
  • 20+ minutes of playing time

If you've enjoyed this game, feel free to write all of your thoughts and emotions down. This is the first game I have ever made so if you find any errors or problems, be sure to inform me! And please ignore all the grammatical mistakes I might have made.
